timeline.message:
New has data format

* We needed to adjust to generated format so it can be easily proccessed
in scripts.
* The generator logic should be refactored since the generated format
has changed and it could be much better designed.

timeline.bodyText: These are all members on the facility, right?

timeline.message:
New has data format

* We needed to adjust to generated format so it can be easily proccessed
in scripts.
* The generator logic should be refactored since the generated format
has changed and it could be much better designed.
